content.text: Hi, my name is participant_1. What is your name?
Hi, I'm participant_2. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to write children's books and listen to rock and roll. What about you?
I like to spend time with my family, and I'm often disappointed in myself, but I try to stay positive and do my best.
That's great that you have a good support system. What are you disappointed in yourself for?
I think I need Botox soon. I'm in good shape, and I'm happy with my weight, but I'm not happy with my wrinkles.
I see. Well, I'm sure you'll look great with Botox. And if you don't, then you'll still be beautiful.
Thanks. I'm not sure why I'm so self-conscious about it.
It's not uncommon to be self-conscious about your appearance. But you're beautiful, and you should know it.
Thanks. I'm trying to work on my self-confidence.
That's great. You're doing a great job.
